name: 801C951A-630D-4BAC-83B4-18B59D7A74DD
caption: Marches following the killing of George Floyd continued in cities across the U.S. and remained mostly peaceful, although some protests ran past curfews. In Minnesota, Gov. Tim Walz announced a civil-rights investigation into the Minneapolis police department and the mother of George Floyd’s 6-year-old daughter gave an emotional press conference. Photo: Scott Heins/Getty Images
